DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect age , weight , body composition pharmacokinetic profile , safety , tolerability intravenous diclofenac sodium ( DIC075V ) adult volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Effects Age , Weight , Body Composition Pharmacokinetics IV Diclofenac Sodium
DOC.detailed_description: This study open label , single center , single-dose study ass effect age , weight , body composition pharmacokinetic profile , safety , tolerability intravenous diclofenac sodium ( DIC075V ) adult volunteer . This study conduct two cohort . The first cohort subject select base body mass index ( BMI ) weight criterion . The second cohort subject select base age .
DOC.criteria: Adult volunteer age 18 Known allergy hypersensitivity diclofenac , aspirin , NSAIDs excipients study preparation History previous and/or present cerebral hemorrhage , peptic ulceration , GI bleed bleed diathesis , positive hepatitis B hepatitis C HIV antibody
